name: places/ChIJt53wMh5awokR-N9Kv0DIMqo

displayName.text: Mark J Bronsky DMD, MS, PC

formattedAddress: 15 Harrison St #1, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 15 Harrison St #1, New York, NY 10013-2890, USA

originalText.text:
Bronsky Orthodontics is the best of the best, and Dr Bronsky is the real deal. I first met Dr. Bronsky 15 years ago, when he treated my children, with outstanding results. I went back to his office a year ago, this time for myself after an injury to my mouth. Mark identified a treatment approach which was MUCH better than what others had proposed, which will make a huge difference in my well-being for the rest of my life.

So, yes, Dr. Bronsky is indeed a world class orthodontist, with deep knowledge and phenomenal skills. Beyond that? He is warm, witty, principled, and innovative. Mark’s team at Bronsky Orthodontics – from the front desk to imaging to hands-on care – reflects his values: they are professional, engaged, always improving, and always a pleasure to work with. I highly recommend Dr. Bronsky for anybody seeking top-notch orthodontic care.

originalText.text:
We LOVE Bronsky Orthodontics and highly  recommend them to anyone who is considering orthodontics care for their teeth. They are simply The Best.

With the highest standards, Dr. Mark Bronsky is the number one top orthodontist in NYC if not the entire Country! As a person he is kind and caring and funny and treats everyone with respect. That kind of leadership reflects on all of his staff who are also happy and kind and respectful and who make every visit a pleasure.

Our children started orthodontic treatment relatively early (ages 7-8) with Dr. Bronsky … and it was the BEST decision we ever made.
At first we were concerned about starting so early but I promise you it saved them their teeth.  That is because when one starts thinking about orthodontics later, when the milk teeth have started to fall out and be replaced by adult teeth, the teeth are no longer as mobile as they were at a younger age and cannot be as easily moved to make room for the descending adult teeth. The thing you want to avoid at all costs is the pulling of teeth (this used to be standard practice when I was a teen and started my ortho treatments at age 13).
With the new technique that Dr. Bronsky uses the appliances make room in the younger child’s mouth so that as adult teeth come in they can drop straight into nice open spaces and this way your child can keep all their teeth.

Our children are born 2002 and 2004 and they all got their "appliances" (not braces it's actually a "retainer") in 2013 and wore them throughout 2013-2014. It made a HUGE difference in how their adult teeth descended.

We are VERY happy with our decision to seek the sage advice of Dr. Bronsky and his staff. Together they saved our children’s teeth and afforded them less time in metal braces during their teen years.  Most importantly the results have been amazing!

Do you wonder if orthodontic treatment is right for you? If so, visit Dr. Bronsky, he will give you honest advice and work out the best possible solution for your teeth.

originalText.text:
To be treated by the most highly recognized Orthodontist in the country should be an honor and despite his recognition and accolades he is the most caring and down to earth doctor you will encounter. Make no mistake that you are getting the BEST Orthodontic care there is..
Super professional office and always runs on time with a highly trained staff makes going to the Dentist a wonderful experience
WE LOVE Dr B
